publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4947 Sandra White: Glasgow’s Culture Quarter—That the Parliament congratulates all those involved in the 8th annual Merchant City Festival in Glasgow, which saw a record number of visitors attending the vast array of performances across the Merchant City; welcomes the festival’s enormous growth since its inception, to become one of Scotland’s most exciting and successful multi-arts platforms, and believes that the area’s rich cultural and architectural tapestry further cements the immense national and international appeal of Glasgow.
S3M-4947 Glasgow’s Culture Quarter (lodged on 28 September 2009) Jamie Hepburn*, Bill Kidd*, Rob Gibson*, Anne McLaughlin*, Kenneth Gibson*, Alasdair Allan*

S3M-4947 Sandra White: Glasgow’s Cultural Quarter—That the Parliament congratulates all those involved in the 8th annual Merchant City Festival in Glasgow, which saw a record number of visitors attending the vast array of performances across the Merchant City; welcomes the festival’s enormous growth since its inception, to become one of Scotland’s most exciting and successful multi-arts platforms, and believes that the area’s rich cultural and architectural tapestry further cements the immense national and international appeal of Glasgow. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn, Bill Kidd, Rob Gibson, Anne McLaughlin, Kenneth Gibson, Alasdair Allan, Dave Thompson*, Gil Paterson*
